abstract: A presentation style that displays a prompt to the user when the accessibility quick action is active.
overview:
## Discussion

The following example shows how to add an [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/accessibilityQuickAction(style:content:)] to pause and resume a workout.

items.description: A presentation style that animates an outline around the view when the accessibility quick action is active.
items.name: outline

title: prompt
